Class Repository<T extends BaseEntity>

java.lang.Object
database.repository.Repository<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of entity managed by the repository, which must extend BaseEntity.
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRepository<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Answers, Invites, Messages, OneTimePasswords, PrivateMessages, Questions, ReadMessages, ReviewerRequests, Reviews, Users
public abstract class Repository<T extends BaseEntity> extends Object implements IRepository<T>
Abstract repository class providing common database operations for entities extending BaseEntity.

This class provides a centralized mechanism for performing CRUD operations using a shared database connection. Subclasses should implement the specific logic for their respective entities.

Author:
Dhruv

    • wrap

      protected <R> R wrap(Repository.SqlOperation<R> operation)
      Wraps an SQL operation, catching SQLException and throwing DataAccessException.
      Type Parameters:
      R - The type of result returned by the operation.
      Parameters:
      operation - The SQL operation to be executed.
      Returns:
      The result of the operation.

    • queryForObject

      protected <R> R queryForObject(String sql, Repository.SqlConsumer paramSetter, Repository.SqlFunction<R> rowMapper)
      Executes a query expecting a single row result, returning that object or null.
      Type Parameters:
      R - The type of the result object.
      Parameters:
      sql - The SQL query to execute.
      paramSetter - A lambda function to set parameters on the PreparedStatement.
      rowMapper - A lambda function to map the ResultSet to a result object.
      Returns:
      The result object, or null if no row was found.

    • queryForList

      protected <R> List<R> queryForList(String sql, Repository.SqlConsumer paramSetter, Repository.SqlFunction<R> rowMapper)
      Executes a query expecting multiple rows, returning them as a list.
      Type Parameters:
      R - The type of the result object.
      Parameters:
      sql - The SQL query to execute.
      paramSetter - A lambda function to set parameters on the PreparedStatement.
      rowMapper - A lambda function to map the ResultSet to result objects.
      Returns:
      A list of result objects.

    • queryForBoolean

      protected boolean queryForBoolean(String sql, Repository.SqlConsumer paramSetter)
      Executes a query expecting a boolean result.
      Parameters:
      sql - The SQL query to execute.
      paramSetter - A lambda function to set parameters on the PreparedStatement.
      Returns:
      true if the query returns a row with a true boolean value, otherwise false.

    • executeUpdate

      protected int executeUpdate(String sql, Repository.SqlConsumer paramSetter)
      Executes an update (INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE) that does not need generated keys.
      Parameters:
      sql - The SQL query to execute.
      paramSetter - A lambda function to set parameters on the PreparedStatement.
      Returns:
      The number of rows affected.

    • executeInsert

      protected int executeInsert(String sql, Repository.SqlConsumer paramSetter)
      Executes an INSERT statement that returns a generated key (if any).
      Parameters:
      sql - The SQL query to execute.
      paramSetter - A lambda function to set parameters on the PreparedStatement.
      Returns:
      The generated key or -1 if none.
